reviews.title: Perfect fit
reviews.content: Super cute style and the green is gorgeous! The undershorts are great if you have thicker or more muscular legs, since they don’t squeeze your thighs like the silicon grippers in the pace rival skirts do.

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.content: Good product, but the size runs a bit large.

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.content: I highly recommend this product. Fits perfectly.

reviews.title: Not satisfied
reviews.content: Why can’t lulu put elastic like the pace rival skirt in ALL their skirts? I’m 5’11” and they ride up almost immediately. Maybe good for running errands but for pickleball or something very active it did not stay in place. Please Lulu put better silicon grippers in ALL your skirts!!!!

reviews.title: Great fit
reviews.content: The skort is perfect. The built in shorts are the perfect length and super comfortable. The skirt itself is very cute and fits very well. It’s perfect for biking or just walking around. 100% recommended.

reviews.title: Perfectly satisfied
reviews.content: Love this skirt because it looks great with the pleats. The fabric is lightweight and perfect for warmer weather. I love the way it fits! It’s the perfect length- I’m 5’11” and it’s not too short!
